price: Ila wale walio subiri wakatenda mema. Hao watapata msamaha na ujira mkubwa.
arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ صَبَرُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَأَجۡرٞ كَبِيرٞ
footnotes: Na aibu hii hawaachi kuwa nayo ila wale wanao subiri wakati wa dhiki, na wakatenda mema wakati wa faraji na shida. Hawa watasamehewa dhambi zao, na watapata ujira mkubwa kwa vitendo vyao vyema.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: illā alladhīna ṣabarū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti ulāika lahum maghfiratun wa-ajrun kabīrun
